title: Chamber hosts 2015 NELA Celtic Festival on Oct. 3
content:
The West Monroe-West Ouachita Chamber of Commerce is pleased to announce it will host the 2015 Northeast Louisiana Celtic Festival on Saturday, Oct. 3 at Kiroli Park in West Monroe. 
  
This year marks the 11th anniversary of the Northeast Louisiana Celtic Festival, which is the longest running Northeast Louisiana festival still in existence.
